title: Tablecloth (Germany), 1933
medium:
Medium: linen, silk thread
Technique: cut work, embroidered
description: Whitework tablecloth patterned by embroidered figures and trees. In each corner, scene placed diagonally to be viewed from each respective corner. Central motif shows three women in medieval attire: one carries a sack of grapes which spill out onto the table, central figure serves the grapes while the remaining figure takes the grapes. Lower left corner shows a woman seated at a table writing a book under two trees in front of a gazebo. Lower right corner shows a woman asleep under a tree. Upper right corner has a woman seated in front of an architectonic doorway that is underneath two trees. Banner across the doorway reads: CLOTHILDE JULIANE 1933. Upper left corner has a woman on horseback.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecloth (Germany), 1933. Medium: linen, silk thread
Technique: cut work, embroidered. 
1971-30-4
